notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.6. It addresses 28 CVEs: CVE-2025-39864, CVE-2022-49969, CVE-2022-49985, CVE-2022-50070, CVE-2022-50137, and 23 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.6
